titles.title: Recognizing the 120th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States of America and the Republic of Bulgaria.
Recognizing the 120th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States of America and the Republic of Bulgaria.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the 120th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States and Bulgaria and acknowledges their enduring partnership as friends and allies.
